title: The Encyclopedia of Record Producers (1998)(gnv64)
description:
The Encyclopedia of Record Producers 
by Eric Olsen and Paul Verna
Billboard Books | July 1998 | ISBN-10: 0823076075 | PDF | 893 pages | 85.2 mb

This is a comprehensive reference guide to American record producers. It includes profiles on over 1000 of the music industry's most famous, each entry featuring a selected discography. Artists profiled include Mike Chapman, Dr. Dre, George Martin, Phil Ramone and others.

"This book is for anyone who has even the slightest interest in what goes on behind the scenes in the music business. Great stories from the men and women who helped make music history... to read about how some of the favorite music was made and what went into the process of it's creation, from both the producer and the artists prospective. The writing in this well-researched encyclopedia is clever, thought-provoking, and oft-times quite funny. Great reading and reference for music writers, or the public at large. "
